title: Batiste Dry Shampoo, Tropical Fragrance, 3 Count
description: Take your hair from flat to fab with Batiste Tropical Dry Shampoo. Our waterless formula targets excess oil, dirt, and grease at the roots. Batiste Tropical locks in subtle, exotic scents of coconut, vanilla, and jasmine that never overpower. Just spray in, massage, style, and go. Batiste Dry Shampoo instantly makes your hair feel clean, fresh, and full of body and texture. Perfect for the girl-on-the-go, use Batiste Dry Shampoo between washes to keep your hair looking fresh and fabulous without the effort. Let's face it, life gets crazy sometimes and skipping a wash (or two) is inevitable. With Batiste Dry Shampoo, you can be confident your hair looks great no matter what life throws your way.
